name: PowerShell Empire
description: A post-exploitation framework that includes a pure-PowerShell2.0 Windows agent, and a pure Python 2.6/2.7 Linux/OS X agent.

name: Impacket
description: A collection of Python classes for working with network protocols. Impacket is focused on providing low-level programmatic access to the packets.

name: BloodHound
description: Visually explore Active Directory trust relationships and find attack paths. An essential tool for AD penetration testing.

name: Linux Privesc Payloads
description: A collection of payloads for Linux privilege escalation, categorized by technique.

name: Windows Privesc Cheatsheet
description: A comprehensive cheatsheet of Windows privilege escalation techniques, including commands and tools.

name: Reverse Shell Cheatsheet
description: A collection of reverse shell one-liners for various languages and platforms.
